title: Ghosts and Ghouls: 13 Classic Tales That Will Gives You the Chills
description: A Collection of 13 classic ghost stories that will give you the chills. Features works by M.R. James, Charles Dickens, Lewis Carroll, Rudyard Kipling, W.W. Jacobs, Edgar Allan Poe, William Hope Hodgson, Ambrose Bierce, Mark Twain
author: Charles Dickens
